mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wz_form_approval a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.flag = '0' desc,a.flag = '1' desc,a.flag = '2' desc,a.flag = '3' desc,a.flag = '4' desc,a.flag = '5' desc,a.flag = '6' desc,a.flag = '7' desc,a.flag = '8' desc,a.flag = '9' desc,a.flag = '10' desc,a.flag = '11' desc, a.flag = '12' desc, a.flag = '13' desc,a.flag = 'xmzz' desc,a.plan_approve_time desc

SELECT
FROM wz_form_approval a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

mapper.insert:
select get_next_id('wz_form_approval','') from dual
select #{id} from dual
INSERT INTO wz_form_approval(
) VALUES ( #{id}, #{formNumber}, #{planNumber}, #{formType}, #{planWriter}, #{planUnit}, #{planApproveTime}, #{purchaser}, #{projectName}, #{reviewTime}, #{reviewTlace}, #{projectBudget}, #{costSource}, #{procurementRange}, #{performance}, #{qualifications}, #{creditStanding}, #{gradingMethods}, #{contentImproved}, #{participants}, #{purchaseReason}, #{supplier}, #{selectReason}, #{purchaserDemandOp}, #{purchaserDemandOpTime}, #{purchaserMajorOp}, #{purchaserMajorOpTime}, #{purchaserPurchaseOp}, #{purchaserPurchaseOpTime}, #{purchaserLeaderOp}, #{purchaserLeaderOpTime}, #{purchaserMainOp}, #{purchaserMainOpTime}, #{jsMajorOp}, #{jsMajorOpTime}, #{jsMajorLeaderOp}, #{jsMajorLeaderOpTime}, #{jsPurchaseOp}, #{jsPurchaseOpTime}, #{jsPurchaseLeaderOp}, #{jsPurchaseLeaderOpTime}, #{finalDemandOp}, #{finalDemandOpTime}, #{finalPurchaseOp}, #{finalPurchaseOpTime}, #{finalDemandLeaderOp}, #{finalDemandLeaderOpTime}, #{finalPurchaseLeaderOp}, #{finalPurchaseLeaderOpTime}, #{createByName}, #{tenantId}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDept}, #{createDeptName}, #{createCompany}, #{createCompanyName}, #{updateBy},
